Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm

You can read the [Data Protection Act 1998 - Fair Processing Notice for the DSA](/dsa-theory-test-booking-service-data-protection "Data Protection Act 1998 - Fair Processing Notice for the DSA") before you start your booking.

introduction:
Book your approved driving instructor (ADI) part 1 test, large goods vehicle (LGV) instructor theory test or register of post-test motorcycle trainers (RPMT) theory test.

*[ADI]: Approved driving instructor
*[RPMT]: Register of post-test motorcycle trainers
*[LGV]: Large goods vehicle
more_information:
You’ll need:

- your driving licence number
- your personal reference number from the Driving Standards Agency (DSA)
- an email address for your booking confirmation to be sent to - if you don’t have an email address you can’t book online

It costs:

- £90 for an ADI part 1 test
- £66 for an LGV instructor theory test
- £66 for an RPMT theory test

^ There's a different process to [book your ADI part 1 test](http://www.nidirect.gov.uk/how-to-become-an-approved-driving-instructor-_adi_ "Book your ADI part 1 test"){:rel="external"} in Northern Ireland. ^

*[ADI]: Approved driving instructor
*[RPMT]: Register of post-test motorcycle trainers
*[LGV]: Large goods vehicle
*[DSA]: Driving Standards Agency
